name: Battle for Kevlon IV
description:
This was my first Unity project - a short Asteroids style game with a twist. 5 missions with a story linking them, and a tribute to the world's first ever viral internet meme.

This was as much of a training project/portfolio piece as a final game, so I don't plan to do any more work on it, which is why I'm not asking for any money for it. The music is also my own work.

Note: I'm running this on a Ryzen 7, I haven't tested it on any other specs.
